text: Proto-Indo-Aryan (sometimes Proto-Indic) is the reconstructed proto-language of the Indo-Aryan languages. ==Features== It is intended to reconstruct the language of the Proto-Indo-Aryans. Being descended from Proto-Indo-Iranian (which in turn is descended from Proto-Indo-European), it has the characteristics of a Satem language. == Further reading == * Morgenstierne, Georg. "Early Iranic Influence upon Indo-Aryan." Acta Iranica, I. s√©rie, Commemoration Cyrus. Vol. I. Hommage universel (1974): 271-279. Category:Languages of Asia
title: Proto-Indo-Aryan
